headline: Is Travelers Still Attractive After Strong 2025 Rally and Earnings Outlook Reassessment?
summary: If you are wondering whether Travelers Companies remains a smart idea after its recent run-up or if much of the potential upside is already reflected in the share price, this breakdown is for you. The stock is trading around $288.52, down 1.8% over the last week but still up 7.4% over the past month, 19.8% year to date, and 136.4% over 5 years. Recent moves have been driven by a mix of improving sentiment toward insurers, stronger pricing power across property and casualty lines, and growing...
